summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx addressed to Jeffrey E. Epstein, detailing shipping charges and services provided. It includes multiple entries for shipments made by Epstein, with specific charges, discounts, and delivery details for each shipment.

events.title: FedEx Invoice Issued
events.description: An invoice was issued by FedEx to Jeffrey E. Epstein detailing shipping charges for various shipments.

locations: 457 Madison Ave FL 4, New York, NY 10022
358 El Brillo Way, Palm Beach, FL 33480
keyFacts: The invoice details multiple shipments made by Jeffrey E. Epstein, with a total charge of USD 487.44.
The invoice includes discounts totaling USD 49.55.
Shipments were sent to various recipients including Glen I. Gordon, David Mialen, and Les Wexner.
The document indicates that a fuel surcharge of 7.00% was applied to the shipments.
The invoice is dated August 30, 2004, with a payment due date of September 14, 2004.
